DATA TYPE MODifiers
change meaning of data types
TYPES:
Long- `Increases the size of datatypes by the size >=4 bytes
= Syntax- long datatype;`
SHort
`DEcreases the size of datatypes by the half of size of the datatype

= Syntax- short datatype;`

long Long- `Increases the size of datatypes by the size >=8 bytes
= Syntax- long long datatype;`
signed= Can store both Positive and negative values 

unsigned= Can store only positive values
